awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 3 nominations.

fullplot: A young girl is on top of the world until a tragic accident dashes her hopes and dreams of becoming a world-class figure skater. Only with the help of those who love her can she prove to the world -- and herself -- that she still has the potential to realize her dreams.

title: Ice Castles
